official_title: A concurrent resolution asking that the President bring the rights of the Polish people to the attention of Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should raise with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev at the November 1985 summit in Geneva, Switzerland, the matter of Poland's suppression of speech and political activity, and that by so doing the President raises and defends the principles of human rights as embodied in the Helsinki Accords.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution asking that the President bring the rights of the Polish people to the attention of Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev.
